fields.name: icon
fields.comment: the icon hash of the app

fields.name: rpc_origins
fields.comment: an array of rpc origin urls, if rpc is enabled

fields.name: bot_public
fields.comment: when false only app owner can join the app's bot to guilds

fields.name: bot_require_code_grant
fields.comment: when true the app's bot will only join upon completion of the full oauth2 code grant flow

fields.name: term_of_service_url
fields.comment: the url of the app's terms of service

fields.name: privacy_policy_url
fields.comment: the url of the app's privacy policy

fields.name: team
fields.comment: if the application belongs to a team, this will be a list of the members of that team

fields.name: guild_id
fields.comment: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the guild on which it has been linked

fields.name: primary_sku_id
fields.comment: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the id of the "Game SKU" that is created, if exists

fields.name: slug
fields.comment: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the URL slug that links to the store page
